abstract: Altria Group will pay $2.9 billion to buy a cigar maker, John Middleton, from privately held Bradford Holdings in order to expand its United States business beyond cigarettes.
lead_paragraph: Altria Group will pay $2.9 billion to buy a cigar maker, John Middleton, from privately held Bradford Holdings in order to expand its United States business beyond cigarettes.

headline.main: Altria to Acquire Cigar Maker for $2.9 Billion
